settings.heading: LEGACY MEMBERSHIP
settings.content: WELCOME TO EDWIN LEGACY. ENJOY 30% OFF ANY FULL-PRICED ORDER, AN ADDITIONAL 15% OFF ALL SALE ITEMS AND ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE DROPS, PRIVATE EVENTS AND MORE.

settings.subtitle: STEP 1
settings.Title: SHOP AT EDWIN
settings.desc: Choose your perfect jeans on Edwin. Premium quality denim meets iconic styles and timeless fits.

settings.subtitle: STEP 2
settings.Title: JOIN THE PROGRAM
settings.desc: Check your email for your exclusive invitation, complete with instructions on setting up your account. Steps are easy as 1-2-3 and you can start shopping with your Legacy benefits immediately.

settings.subtitle: STEP 2
settings.Title: ENJOY 30% OFF
settings.desc: Proceeding to checkout and enjoy 30% off on any full-priced items and extra 15% off on selected SALE items.

settings.title: CREATE ACCOUNT
settings.text: Create an account or Log In and start shopping at EDWIN USA.

settings.title: SPEND $300
settings.text: Start shopping at EDWIN USA. Any customer has spend from $300 will be invited to join the Legacy Membership.

settings.title: ENJOY 30% OFF
settings.text: An invitation will be sent to your email. Follow instruction and Log In when shopping at EDWIN USA to enjoy the benefits*

settings.heading: BOOGIE ON DOWN - LIMITED EDITION STYLES

settings.text: EXTRA 15% OFF ON SELECTED SALE ITEMS FOR LEGACY MEMBERS

settings.heading: 30% off any full-priced items. Extra 15% off all Sale items
Legacy Membership term & condition
settings.content:
Legacy Membership is our private members-only club. We know you love denim as much as we do, and Legacy gives you more of what you love. We can't wait for you to enjoy the benefits of the Legacy Membership Program, and here are a few things you should know:

  1. To qualify for a Legacy Membership you must: spend $300 or more in 2024 & be opted into our newsletter
  2. Invitations to join the Legacy Membership will be sent via e-mail, and will be prompted to set up your account. Having issues? Contact us - contact@edwin-usa.com
  3. Memberships are good for a Calendar Year and renew/restart after 12 months
  4. Legacy members enjoy 30% off all full-priced productsLegacy members enjoy 15% off Sale items
  5. Membership discounts cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions
  6. Purchases are eligible for Free Standard Shipping, per our Shipping Policy

settings.heading: HOW CAN I JOIN THE LEGACY MEMBERSHIP?
settings.content: When you’ve reached the threshold of spending from $300, you’ll receive our invitation via email. Having trouble with your membership, or haven't received your invite? Contact us - contact@edwin-usa.com

settings.heading: I have shopped on edwin usa before but i don’t have an account, how can i activate the legacy membership?
settings.content: If you have shopped at our store before and receive the invitation email, just simply create an account using the email which used for your previous order. Having trouble with your membership, or haven't received your invite? Contact us - contact@edwin-usa.com

settings.heading: Where can I get the discount code?
settings.content: You don’t need to copy, paste or apply anything at checkout. The discount will be automatically when you’re logged in while shopping.

settings.heading: HOW CAN I REMOVE THE LEGACY MEMBERSHIP DISCOUNT FROM MY ORDER?
settings.content: In case you don’t want to use the Legacy Membership discount, you can log out and checkout as guest. Your email and shipping information are not affected.

settings.heading: CAN I USE ANOTHER DISCOUNT AT THE SAME TIME WITH LEGACY MEMBERSHIP BENEFIT?
settings.content:
Legacy Membership discounts cannot be combined with other discounts or promotions. If you would like to use a discount code or take advantage of a promotion, you can simply add the promotional code or discount code to your order and our system will detect and apply the higher value discount to your order.

You can also log out and check out as a guest.

settings.heading: I have spent more $300 in 2024, how can i find my legacy membership discount?
settings.content:
You will be sent an invitation to our Legacy Membership and prompted to setup an account.

Please ensure you are subscribed to our newsletter.   

Please also note that total spend does not include items that were returned within the 30 day return window.   

Having trouble with your membership, or haven't received your invite? Contact us - contact@edwin-usa.com
